title: So long old Moxie
body:
Tonight's the final night at our original location, so just for fun, here's a link to the post I wrote on our opening night, 1,143 days ago. If you'd like to come by and see the old place one last time, you have just under five hours before we lock the doors for good.

Thanks for the memories, 408 W. Walnut!
author: Dan

comments.author: stevie_g
comments.body:
If you are indeed planning a test screening prior to the official openning as you did at Moxie 1.0, I would like to put in my reservation for three seats...

Amelie would still be a great choice. If you use both screens, perhaps Pan's Labyrinth in the second auditorium...
